channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: JP Morgan’s AI adoption hit 50% of employees. The secret? A connectivity-first architecture
item.description: When Derek Waldron and his technical team at JPMorgan Chase first launched an LLM suite with personal assistants two-and-a-half years ago, they weren’t sure what to expect. That wasn’t long after the game-changing emergence of ChatGPT, but in enterprise, skepticism was still high. Surprisingly, employees opted into the internal platform organically — and quickly. Within months, usage jumped from zero to 250,000 employees. Now, more than 60% of employees across sales, finance, technology, operations, and other departments use the continually evolving, continually connected suite.“We were surpri...

item.title: Urban VPN Proxy is the latest free VPN spying on users – here's how to stay safe
item.description: The free Urban VPN Proxy Chrome extension has recently made headlines after being caught silently stealing users' AI chats. Yet, it's not an isolated incident but rather a stark reminder to use only reputable VPN apps.

item.title: Watch out, Apple – the OnePlus Pad Go 2 just raised the bar for all mid-range tablets
item.description: With a faster chipset, larger battery, and more expansive software features, the OnePlus Pad Go 2 is the new mid-range tablet to beat.

item.title: Google déploie Gemini 3 Flash : le nouveau modèle par défaut qui surpasse GPT-5.2 sur certains points
item.description: Google vient de presser le bouton "déploiement" pour Gemini 3.0 Flash sur nos smartphones. Une mise à jour qui semble anodine, mais qui cache une refonte totale de la manière dont votre IA réfléchit avant de vous répondre.

item.title: AWS systems targeted by crypto mining scam using hijacked IAM credentials
item.description: The attacks were stopped, but they could always return - if users don't strengthen their passwords.

item.title: Waze could soon fix its biggest weakness to tempt you from Google Maps
item.description: Waze is reportedly testing traffic light indication during navigation, with the feature due to be rolled out in the coming months.

item.title: One of our favorite budgeting apps has 50 percent off annual subscriptions right now
item.description:
With a new year just around the corner, now is the perfect time to take stock of your finances. A budgeting app can help with that, and right now you can get 50 percent off your first year of a Monarch Money plan. All you need to do is enter the code MONARCHVIP at checkout and you’ll pay $50 for the initial 12 months instead of the regular price of $100. Note that the offer only applies to new users.
Monarch Money was the runner-up in our guide to the best budgeting apps in 2025, and it was definitely a grower. Initially we found the experience of using the app to be needlessly complicated c...

item.title: Mercedes-Benz discontinues feature that syncs music to driving
item.description: Mercedes-Benz sent out a notice to customers recently announcing its plans to discontinue MBUX Sound Drive, an interactive audio feature that syncs music to the car's actions. The feature was first announced less than a year ago at CES in partnership with Black Eyed Peas frontman Will.i.am. Notices went out recently to customers that MBUX […]

item.title: La Chine tient-elle son Nvidia ? Qui est MetaX qui affole les marchés financiers avec ses GPU
item.description: C'est la troisième plus grosse introduction en bourse de l'année sur le Star Market. MetaX, une jeune pousse fondée par des anciens d'AMD, promet de rivaliser avec les puces IA de Nvidia. Le marché y croit dur comme fer : l'action est passée de 104 à 829 yuans en une journée.

item.title: This iPhone case with a second screen lets you snap selfies with its rear cameras
item.description: Smartphones with secondary screens on the back aren't a new idea. Most recently the Xiaomi 17 series launched in September with a smaller rear display and while the company suggests using it for widgets or gaming, the most practical use is as a way to frame selfies captured with the phone's superior rear cameras. The […]

item.title: Warner Bros. Discovery wants its shareholders to reject Paramount’s latest offer
item.description: Though Paramount Skydance was trying to buy Warner Bros. Discovery for much more money than Netflix is offering, David Zaslav and the rest of WBD's board are urging their shareholders to give Oracle scion David Ellison the cold shoulder. Today, WBD's board announced that it has unanimously decided that its shareholders would be much better […]

item.title: Here are 10 Apple deals that are on sale and arrive before Christmas
item.description: I'm rounding up every single Apple device, including AirPods, iPads, MacBooks, and more, that are on sale and arrive before Christmas.

item.title: Jimmy Wales trusts the process
item.description: Wikipedia will be 25 years old in January. During that time, the encyclopedia has gone from a punchline about the unreliability of online information to the factual foundation of the web. The project's status as a trusted source of facts has made it a target of authoritarian governments and powerful individuals, who are attempting to […]

item.title: Nikon ZR review: cinema cameras just got a major new player
item.description: The ZR is the first in a new line of cinema cameras by Nikon, packing 6K video, internal RAW recording, RED color profiles, and in-body image stabilization.

item.title: Official Proton VPN app lands on even more Linux devices
item.description: Linux users rejoice! Proton VPN has officially released its new command-line interface for Arch, Debian, Ubuntu, and Fedora. Here is what you need to know about the new tool.

item.title: Voici la meilleure carte graphique de l’année – Frandroid Awards 2025
item.description: Pour cet exercice 2025, la rédaction a choisi de consacrer l'AMD Radeon RX 9060 XT comme la meilleure carte graphique de l'année. Découvrez pourquoi ce GPU a reçu le Frandroid Awards de sa catégorie.

item.title: T-Mobile's latest prepaid plan deal gets you a two-line unlimited plan for just $75/mo
item.description: Looking for a cheap two-line unlimited plan? T-Mobile's latest deal gets you an unlimited data plan with perks for just $75/mo - much cheaper than the competitors.

item.title: #FrandroidOffreMoi un énorme espace de stockage à vie sur pCloud (2 To)
item.description: Le calendrier de l’Avent #FrandroidOffreMoi se poursuit avec encore un cadeau de taille sur cette 17e journée. Aujourd'hui, c'est 2 To de stockage à vie qui sont à la clé.

item.title: La Xiaomi SU7 va déjà changer : un « refresh » avec une augmentation de prix et quelques changements attendus
item.description: Xiaomi préparerait une nouvelle version de la SU7 pour le printemps 2026. Mauvaise nouvelle : le prix pourrait grimper.

item.title: Des écouteurs ouverts à conduction aérienne pour les sportifs à moins de 30 euros, cela existe bien
item.description: Après avoir commercialisé ses premiers écouteurs tour de cou à conduction osseuse en octobre 2025, la marque française Muse élargit son catalogue dédié aux sportifs et aux utilisateurs urbains avec le lancement du M-228 AC, son premier modèle exploitant la technologie de conduction aérienne. Il est proposé à moins de 30 euros seulement.

item.title: Les nouveaux tarifs de Free sont là : il y a une bonne et une mauvaise nouvelle
item.description: L'opérateur Free publie sa dernière brochure tarifaire avec entrée en vigueur le 17 décembre 2025. Voyons ce qu'elle nous réserve.

item.title: The very giftable Dyson Airwrap i.d. is down to its best-ever price at Amazon — save over $100
item.description: The Dyson Airwrap i.d. is down to just $479 at Amazon in both the straight and curly models — its lowest price ever at 26% off.

item.title: DJI Neo 2 : ce nouveau petit drone 4K baisse déjà son prix dans ce pack avec radiocommande et batteries supplémentaires
item.description: Le DJI Neo 2 est un petit drone pouvant être pris en main sans aucune formation. Pour améliorer sa maniabilité, la marque propose une édition dotée d'une radiocommande qui passe de 399 euros à 364 euros chez Joybuy.

item.title: Credit check company breached, 5.6 million customers info exposed
item.description: Millions of customers had very sensitive financial information stolen in a breach of a credit check company.

item.title: Rétrospective Steam 2025 : pourquoi vous passez plus de temps sur vos vieux jeux que sur les nouveautés
item.description: La rétrospective Steam de 2025 montre que l'immense majorité des joueurs passe son temps sur de vieux jeux.

item.title: Uber and DoorDash challenge NYC law that encourages tipping
item.description: Uber and DoorDash are challenging a forthcoming NYC law that encourages tipping on food-delivery apps, as reported by The New York Times. The two entities have filed a joint federal lawsuit just ahead of the ruling going into effect next month. Back in 2023, many food delivery apps in the city moved the tip suggestion box to after purchases had been completed. This is sort of how rideshare apps work. It followed NYC mandating a minimum pay rate for food delivery workers, the first in the country. The new law simply switches the tip suggestion box back to checkout, with a suggestion of ten perc...

item.title: My dream Nikon lens has finally landed – an affordable 35mm f/1.2 prime
item.description: Viltrox gives the Z-mount treatment to its 35mm F1.2 LAB lens, which looks set to become my go-to documentary photography lens

item.title: Apple leak suggests an M5 Max iMac Pro is coming – here are 5 features I want to see
item.description: Apple’s iMac Pro could soon return with an M5 Max chip, a new leak claims.

item.title: Firefox security warning - multiple browser addons found to be riddled with malware, so be on your guard
item.description: More than a dozen Firefox extensions were secretly stealing money from affiliates and tracking people's behavior.

item.title: Mistral et les start-up françaises s’opposent frontalement à cette proposition de loi française sur l’IA
item.description: Ces sociétés tirent à boulet rouge sur la proposition de loi française, provenant du Sénat, qui veut mettre fin au « pillage » des auteurs par des outils d'intelligence artificielle.

item.title: This robovac that doubles as a stick vacuum is on sale for just $300 — a new record-low price
item.description: The Eufy E20 3-in-1 Robot Vacuum is on sale for just $299.99 (or 54% off) thanks to a coupon code. It's never been cheaper.

item.description: Get the Lego Classic Large Creative Brick Box for just $31.59 (47% off) at Amazon. Includes 790 pieces and arrives by Christmas.

item.description: Score the Sonos Arc Ultra for $879 (save $220). Experience 9.1.4 surround sound and deeper bass with Sonos' flagship soundbar.

item.title: Googles next experimental AI project is called CC, and theres already a waitlist to try it
item.description: Google's latest experimental AI project is called CC, a tool that delivers a personalized morning brief based on your emails and meeting schedule.

item.title: Last chance to score $350 off the DJI Power 1000 portable power station at Amazon
item.description: As of Dec. 17, save $350 on the DJI Power 1000 portable power station at Amazon.

item.title: The best Garmin watches for training and everyday life
item.description: Few brands are as synonymous with outdoor sports as Garmin. You’ll find these fitness trackers and smartwatches on dozens of wrists at any 5K, marathon, or Ironman. You’ll also find Garmin devotees among divers, thru-hikers, golfers, kiteboarders — you name it. But these devices aren’t just for athletes. The company’s made significant strides in its […]...

item.title: Radiant Nuclear raises $300M for its semi-sized 1 MW reactor
item.description: Radiant Nuclear is developing a small modular reactor to replace diesel generators. The startup previously raised $165 million in May.

item.title: Help clean the ocean every time you use Wave Browser
item.description: Help clean the ocean every time you use Wave Browser

item.title: James Cameron Wants to Start Doing Things That Aren’t ‘Avatar’ Again
item.description: Cameron has a plan that may involve fewer blue aliens and more 'Terminator' (without Schwarzenegger).

item.title: Researchers Tested Herpes Drugs for Alzheimer’s. It Backfired
item.description: People given the herpes medication valacyclovir actually experienced worse cognitive decline than those given a placebo.

item.title: Scientists Thought Saturn’s Moon Titan Hid a Secret Ocean. They Were Wrong
item.description: For more than a decade, scientists have accepted that Titan, Saturn’s biggest moon, has a subsurface ocean of liquid water. A new look at the data suggests otherwise.

item.title: The Most Powerful Politics Influencers Barely Post About Politics
item.description: New research shows that social media creators have enormous influence over their audiences' politics—especially those who don't normally share political content.

item.title: Gemini 3 Flash is here, bringing a ‘huge’ upgrade to the Gemini app
item.description: Google is upgrading its Gemini app with Gemini 3 Flash, a more efficient version of its flagship AI model that's still capable of fielding complex requests. The new model will replace Gemini 2.5 Flash as the default inside the Gemini app, and it's headed to Google Search, too. Its arrival comes one month after the […]

item.title: AI’s water and electricity use soars in 2025
item.description: AI created as much carbon pollution this year as New York City and guzzled up as much H20 as people consume globally in water bottles, according to new estimates. The study paints what's likely a pretty conservative picture of AI's environmental impact since it's based on the relatively limited amount of data that's currently available […]

item.title: Peacock will bombard you with ads as soon as you open the app
item.description: Peacock has found a new place to stuff ads. Starting next year, the streaming service will greet you with an ad alongside your profile icon on the "Who's watching?" screen when you open the app. During a press briefing, Peacock parent company NBCUniversal showed off how these "arrival ads" might look. One image shows your […]

item.title: Google launches Gemini 3 Flash, makes it the default model in the Gemini app
item.description: Google is making Gemini 3 Flash the default model in the Gemini app and oAI model for Search

item.title: Google launches Gemini 3 Flash — and claims it's as fast as using traditional Search
item.description: Google just launched Gemini 3 Flash and promises it will revolutionize AI search.

item.title: Google's Gemini 3 Flash model outperforms GPT-5.2 in some benchmarks
item.description: Almost exactly a month after the debut of Gemini 3 Pro in November, Google has begun rolling out the more efficient Flash version of its latest AI model. According to the company, the new system offers similar "pro-grade" reasoning performance as its flagship model at a fraction of the cost, making it ideal for everyday use. In benchmarks, the new system performed significantly better than Google's previous generation models, including Gemini 2.5 Pro. More notably, in Google’s testing it managed to trade blows with GPT-5.2, the model OpenAI rushed out to counter Gemini 3 Pro. A table comparing...

item.title: Dernière chance pour Noël : Zendure et Valerion cassent les prix de leurs best-sellers tech [Sponso]
item.description: Zendure et Valerion affichent tous les deux de grosses promotions sur leurs produits phares juste avant Noël. Le pack SolarFlow 2400 AC + 2 batteries AB3000X perd ainsi 959 euros et le vidéoprojecteur Valerion VisionMaster Pro2 est à seulement 2399 euros.

item.title: Coursera and Udemy enter a merger agreement valued at around $2.5B
item.description: Coursera and Udemy, two of the biggest names in online learning, are combining platforms next year.

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs chargeurs sans fil à induction pour smartphone en 2025 ?
item.description: La charge sans fil est désormais plus largement répandue pour les smartphones et les accessoires. Voici notre sélection des meilleurs chargeurs sans fil pour recharger tranquillement votre smartphone Android, votre iPhone ou encore vos écouteurs ou votre montre connectée.

item.title: Les lunettes Ray-Ban Meta (Gen 1) sont de retour à un super prix pour Noël
item.description: Même si Meta a récemment dévoilé la deuxième génération de ses Ray-Ban connectées, les premières, révélées il y a deux ans, restent toujours aussi intéressantes. Les Ray-Ban Meta Gen 1 sont en plus proposées à 247 euros au lieu de 329 euros.

item.title: Bluesky launches a privacy-focused ‘find friends’ feature without invite spam
item.description: The Bluesky contact matching feature is opt-in and your data won't be used to spam your friends, the social network says.

item.title: « Je suis très inquiet » : la vidéo du faux coup d’État qui affole l’Élysée et que Facebook refuse de supprimer
item.description: Une vidéo virale générée par intelligence artificielle, annonçant la chute d'Emmanuel Macron, a fait le tour du monde. Alerté par un homologue étranger paniqué, le président français a exigé son retrait. Le refus catégorique de Facebook révèle l'impuissance de l'État face aux géants du numérique.

item.title: SwitchBot’s space-saving robot vacuum is on sale starting at just $179.99
item.description: Small robot vacuums that fit into tight spaces rarely deliver strong performance, which is what makes the SwitchBot K11 Plus stand out. And right now, you can purchase the compact yet capable robovac from Amazon and SwitchBot for a new low of $179.99 ($220 off), the latter with code XMAS2GIFT55. Just note that only Switchbot […]

item.title: Creating apps like Signal or WhatsApp could be 'hostile activity,' claims UK watchdog
item.description: An independent review of the newly implemented National Security Act suggests that developers of encrypted messaging apps may be considered hostile actors. This, as lawmakers' pressure against encryption keeps growing.

item.title: Stream sport for less over the holidays — get DirecTV for just $50 in first-ever flash sale
item.description: Get your first month of the DirecTV Signature Entertainment package for $50 through Jan. 6 in first-ever flash holiday sale.

item.title: Après Bosch, le spécialiste du vélo électrique Riese & Müller tourne aussi le dos au plus grand salon vélo d’Europe
item.description: C'est un choix totalement délibé : la célèbre marque allemande Riese & Müller annonce organiser son propre mini-salon... aux mêmes dates et à seulement 1h de route de l’évènement Eurobike 2026.

item.title: The best gifts for pets (and their parents): 35+ ideas that the internet and Mashable reporters stand by

item.description: Watch the 'Dancing with the Stars' champs and cutest couple ever roll out the tech they’re obsessed with on Walmart Live.

item.title: Warner Bros. Discovery rejects Paramount’s hostile bid, calls offer ‘illusory’
item.description: Warner Bros. Discovery called Paramount's offer "illusory" and said that the company had misled shareholders about its financing.
